data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Lishui, Zhejiang, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lishui, Zhejiang, China

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Lishui, Zhejiang, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Lishui, Zhejiang, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 48,172 believers in the county of Lishui to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the She people.
Lord we pray you unite the 48,172 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Lishui.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 48,172 believers find a person of peace today among the 586,828 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Lishui to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
